General.Name: Yang Guang Co Ltd
General.Description: Yang Guang Co.,Ltd. operates as a real estate development company in China. The company engages in commercial operation management, property leasing, and commercial and residential late-sale business. The company was formerly known as Super Shine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yang Guang Co.,Ltd. in 2008. Yang Guang Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

3.Name: Mr. Liu  Fudong
3.Title: Director of Investment Promotion Dept and Director of Ruijing YangGuang Retail Asset Mgmt Co Ltd

4.Name: Mr. Li  Dong
